root.name: Dungeon Twister
root.description: OverviewDungeon Twister is an Xbox Live Arcade and PlayStation Network incarnation of the role-playing board game created by Christophe Boelinger. French developer Hydravision states that they intended to make the game as close to playing the real board game as possible.The board game version is a two-player strategy game with two sets of adventurers trying to be the first out of a dungeon. Players have an identical set of different characters, each with a different skill set. The first to five points wins. Players earn points for getting individual characters out of the dungeon, among other things.
